headline: Aptiv Refocuses On Higher Margins As Versigent Spin Off Reshapes Thesis
summary: Aptiv (NYSE:APTV) has completed the spin-off of its Electrical Distribution Systems business into a new company called Versigent. The transaction includes the appointment of a new executive leadership team at Versigent, separating it from Aptiv’s core operations. Aptiv is sharpening its focus on higher margin, growth oriented activities while Versigent operates as an independent entity. The company is also expanding beyond automotive markets through partnerships with robotics and AI...
